sys_script_include.name: GraphClientCredentials

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_494e2bf193a742107ea47fbcebba1050
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1105087_loaner_r.GraphClientCredentials</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GraphClientCredentials</name><script><![CDATA[var GraphClientCredentials = Class.create();
GraphClientCredentials.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        var requestBody = "client_id=" + clientId +
            "&scope=https%3A%2F%2Fgraph.microsoft.com%2F.default" +
            "&client_secret=" + clientSecret +
            "&grant_type=client_credentials";

        var tokenRequest = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2("GraphApi - Token request", "POST");
        tokenRequest.setEndpoint(tokenEndpoint);
        tokenRequest.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/x-www-urlencoded");
        tokenRequest.setRequestBody(requestBody);
    },
    type: 'GraphClientCredentials'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-23 08:05:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>494e2bf193a742107ea47fbcebba1050</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GraphClientCredentials</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Loaner Request" source="x_1105087_loaner_r">98b3807d93e302107ea47fbcebba1094</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Request">98b3807d93e302107ea47fbcebba1094</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_494e2bf193a742107ea47fbcebba1050</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-23 09:32:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
